name: Doors have good, consistent perimeter and no binding
For hollow core doors, hinge and lock sides are correct. For fire doors, the top hinge (T.H) side is correct
Door free of scratches and damages
Closer working at an optimum level of speed & force
Seals are not impeding the closure/opening of the door while still maintaining a tight seal
All sundries are at correct height
All sundries are free of damage
